dct_title_s: Sovereignty and mandate boundary lines in 1921 of the islands of the Pacific
dct_description_sm: prepared in the Map Department of the National Geographic Society for the National Geographic magazine ; drawn by Albert H. Bumstead and James M. Darley.
Issued with the National geographic magazine, v. 40, no. 6, Dec. 1921.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
